oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Stereoselective synthesis of (-)-1-epi-ventiloquinone L and (+)-ventiloquinone L, the monomeric unit of cardinalin 3
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: FERNANDES, RA
INGLE, AB
CHAVAN, VP
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: CHROMIUM-CARBENE COMPLEXES
DERMOCYBE CARDINALIS
ALKYNE CYCLOADDITION
(+)-NOCARDIONE B
FORMAL SYNTHESIS
VENTILOQUINONE-L
(+)-ALLO-ELEUTHERIN
(+)-ELEUTHERIN
ANTIBIOTICS
PIGMENTS
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A stereoselective synthesis of (-)-1-epi-ventiloquinone L and (+)-ventiloquinone L, the monomeric unit of cardinalin 3 has been described. The synthesis is completed in 7 steps with 10.5% and 13% overall yields for (-)-1-epi-ventiloquinone L and (+)-ventiloquinone L respectively. The key steps involve Dotz benzannulation of carbene 5 with alkyne 6 to give a substituted naphthalene moiety and oxa-Pictet-Spengler reaction to install the 1,3-dimethylpyran moiety.
